resources.string: Distribution of discount percentages across all products in the dataset. This histogram shows how frequently different discount ranges occur, with a kernel density estimate (KDE) overlay providing a smoothed representation of the discount distribution.
Displays the average discount percentages for each month over time, revealing trends and patterns in discounting across different months.
Shows average discount percentages across various categories with abbreviated names for clarity, highlighting trends in discount levels by category.
Visualizes the relationship between discount percentages and product prices, distinguishing between maximum and minimum prices using different colors.
Illustrates relationships between discount and other numerical features, including maximum and minimum prices and weight, helping to identify patterns and correlations.
Provides a summary of the distribution of discount percentages, highlighting central tendency, variability, and potential outliers.
Displays average discount percentages across categories and months using color intensity to represent discount magnitude.
